SourceAnalyzer.Name: Layout Rules (Community)
SourceAnalyzer.Description: Community rules for checking the layout of a file.

BooleanProperty.Name: IncludeGenerated
BooleanProperty.Description: Indicates whether to enforce the rules on generated code.

Rule.Name: LinesMustNotEndWithWhitespace
Rule.Context: Lines must not end with whitespace.
Rule.Description: Validates that the character a newline is never preceeded by whitespace.

Rule.Name: LinesMustNotBeLongerThanNumCharacters
Rule.Context: Line length must not exceed {0} characters.
Rule.Description: Validates that line length does not exceed a configurable number of characters.

Rule.Name: FilesMustNotEndWithMultipleEmptyLines
Rule.Context: Files must not end with multiple empty lines.
Rule.Description: Validates that a file does not end with more than one empty line.

Rule.Name: FilesMustEndWithNewline
Rule.Context: Files must end with a new line.
Rule.Description: Validates that a file ends with a new line.

Rule.Name: FilesMustNotStartWithWhitespace
Rule.Context: Files must not start with whitespace.
Rule.Description: Validates that a file does not start with whitespace.
